mapper.select: SELECT V.gprs_vid,V.card_id,V.allot_id,V.how_month,V.gprs_value,V.balance_dval,V.balance_value, V.time_added,V.time_modify,V.time_expire,A.allot_id,A.allot_month,A.allot_value, A.allot_reset,A.assigned_month FROM cc_gprs_value AS V LEFT JOIN cc_gprs_allot A ON V.allot_id = A.allot_id WHERE V.card_id = #{card_id}
